name: toc.js
body: **toc.js** is a simple piece of Javascript that numbers the headings (`h1`-`h6`) in the HTML file and creates a table of contents, see an [example](example.html).
tagline: toc.js numbers the headings in the HTML file and creates a table of contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
